contentfulBlogPost.title: New OSHW Certification Mark usage guide and directory updates

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you’ve certified a project in the past, you might have come across our OSHW Certification Mark: It’s a neat way of showing off your project’s open source status and helping your users find their way to the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/list.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"list of certificated projects","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4sGKq3iMUY9PRUy6InlXRr","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-entry-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We recently added ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/mark-usage.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"a brand new guide","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" on how to use this mark in various situations, such as on printed circuit boards and in documentation. We’ve also updated the certification directory so you can easily download your project’s certification mark ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/us000001.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"right from the project page","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"– complete with its project UID!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"5QpwURyGL0GeUNRIZ8Mrvd","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-entry-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We hope these changes have a positive impact on your work and we hope to see the certification mark out in the wild more often.
